trans-unit.source: A block-level flow content element which enables <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> elements (i.e. a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" />) to be embedded (hosted) in flow content.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de conteúdo de fluxo de nível de bloco que permite que elementos <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> (ou seja, um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Button" />) sejam inseridos (hospedados) no conteúdo de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> element (i.e. a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) may be embedded directly in flow content by enclosing it in a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> (see example below).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elemento (ou seja, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>) podem ser incorporadas diretamente no conteúdo de fluxo, colocando-lo em um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> (veja o exemplo abaixo).

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> diretamente hospedar não mais de um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> filho.

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento filho hospedada por um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> pode hospedar seus próprios filhos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elements to host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elements within flow content.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elementos ao host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elementos dentro do conteúdo de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: A figura a seguir mostra como esse exemplo é renderizado.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content")
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de tela: UIElement inserido no conteúdo de fluxo](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "captura de tela: UIElement inserido no conteúdo de fluxo")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância vazia da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object specifying the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que especifica o conteúdo inicial do novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> object as the initial contents of the new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />, usando um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado como o conteúdo inicial do novo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates usage of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra o uso desse construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hospedado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hosted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> hospedado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may directly host no more than one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> child.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> diretamente hospedar não mais de um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> filho.

trans-unit.source: However, the child element hosted by an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> may host children of its own.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o elemento filho hospedada por um <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> pode hospedar seus próprios filhos.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], wrapping a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> in an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> is equivalent to setting that <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)], encapsulamento um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> em uma <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> é equivalente à configuração <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> como o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elements to host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elements within flow content.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer> elementos ao host <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> elementos dentro do conteúdo de fluxo.

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows how this example renders.
trans-unit.target: A figura a seguir mostra como esse exemplo é renderizado.

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "Screenshot: UIElement embedded in flow content")
trans-unit.target: ![Captura de tela: UIElement inserido no conteúdo de fluxo](~/add/media/blockuicontainer.png "captura de tela: UIElement inserido no conteúdo de fluxo")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Documents.BlockUIContainer.Child%2A> propriedade programaticamente.
